sequence:
Loaded with Lead and Love

<size=45>Chapter 6 - A Maid's Feelings (Part 1)</size>

scripts.say: Good morning, Master. Breakfast is ready, so please get rinsed. I mean, washed.
Please don't greet me as if you're one of those Destroyer girls. Surely you did not miss me that much.
But I did! Since you've been helping me around the house so much, I look forward to seeing you even on the weekends.
...I never thought that I was catering to such a depraved Master. How careless of me...
Perhaps I should not pamper you anymore, so please clean up the table after breakfast by yourself.
Surely you do not mean to tell me that you want to become a piece of bloated driftwood who expects to be cleaned up after by maids?
"I just want to be able to stay with you like this."
Days later, Port - Commander's personal quarters
I found myself awake earlier than usual. What's the time...? Seems like I can afford to go back to sleep...
I could hazily hear a conversation occuring in the hallway outside my room...
This is how a maid should conduct herself. After all, I'm not as greedy as Belfast.
But Sheffy, deep down, you know you want this. And your heart isn't going to let you give up so easily...
Even if you want to pursue stability in your life, I still feel that you should pursue a stability that still allows you to be true to yourself.
I seemed to have overheard quite a difficult conversation.
